title: "Machine learning offers high-definition glimpse of how genomes organize in single cells"
excerpt: "Within the microscopic boundaries of a single human cell, the intricate folds and arrangements of protein and DNA bundles dictate a person's fate: which genes are expressed, which are suppressed, and—importantly—whether they stay healthy or develop disease."
